metadata.title: CVE-2024-32612 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 Library through 1.14.3 contains a heap-based buffer over-read inH5HL__fl_deserialize in H5HLcache.c, resulting in the corruption of theinstruction pointer, a different vulnerability than CVE-2024-32613.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
